name: lest.MockResult
description: When a mock function returns or throws, an insance of `lest.MockResult` is added to the mock's data containing information about the result.

fields.name: type
description: If the mock function ran successfully when it was last called, then this will be `"return"`.
If the function threw an error, then this will be `"throw"`.

fields.name: value
description: If the result type is `"return"`, then this will be an array of the values returned by the mock function.
If the result type is `"throw"`, then this will be the error that was thrown.
